creator: rarathore@ptc.com
text:
Hi Team
	As you know Java9 release date is coming near (End of July 2017), So Please let me know whether you have any plan to incorporate Java 9 related changes in your libs,
Thanks a lot
Rajendra Rathore

We already have built in Java9 support on some tasks (e.g. javac).
If you miss something, let us now by discussing on dev@ant or opening a ticket.

Just for discussing Bugzilla is the wrong tool ;)
creator: jan@materne.de
